disableCheckbox.description: Disables the checkbox of the treeNode

key.description: Required property, should be unique in the tree

value.description: Will be treated as treeNodeFilterProp by default, should be unique in the tree

scopedSlots.description: When using treeNodes, you can use this property to configure the properties that support the slot, such as scopedSlots: { title: 'XXX'}
